Item ID1955

Cooking apples are primarily used as an ingredient to make apple pies. They can be obtained from the Cooks' Guild, Culinaromancer's Chest, Logava Gricoller's Cooking Supplies, or alternatively, harvested from an apple tree grown from an apple tree seed in a fruit tree patch by a player with a Farming level of 27.

Baskets of apples (which contain 5 apples each) can be used in the Farming skill to pay farmers to watch planted trees. One basket is needed to watch willows and strawberries, while four baskets are needed to watch a banana tree.

Contents

  • 2 Obtaining apples

Obtaining apples[edit | edit source]

Respawns[edit | edit source]

  • 3 barrels - on the Lady Zay, while at the Pirates' Cove (1 barrel is in the hull).
  • 5 barrels - on the pirates' ship at Lunar Isle. 1 barrel is on the deck, 4 are in the hull. 2 of the barrels in the hull are inaccessible.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The apple's examine of "Keeps the doctor away" is the latter half of the proverb, "An apple a day keeps the doctor away." A barrel of apples (non-carryable) completes the proverb with its examine of "An apple a day..."
  • There are a lot of apple trees around the The Golden Field tavern in Hosidius, however the player cannot pick any apples from these.
  • The apples' bright green colour suggests that they are based on Granny Smith apples 1. In real life, Granny Smiths are used in many cooking recipes, and they are also used to brew alcoholic apple cider 2.

[[File:Cooking apple detail.png|left|110px]]
'''Cooking apples''' are primarily used as an ingredient to make [[apple pie]]s. They can be obtained from the [[Cooks' Guild]], [[Culinaromancer's Chest]], [[Logava Gricoller's Cooking Supplies]], or alternatively, harvested from an [[apple tree]] grown from an [[apple tree seed]] in a [[Farming/Patch locations#Fruit tree patches|fruit tree patch]] by a player with a [[Farming]] level of 27.

[[Apples|Baskets of apples]] (which contain 5 apples each) can be used in the Farming [[Skills|skill]] to pay farmers to watch planted trees. One basket is needed to watch [[Willow Tree (Farming)|willows]] and [[strawberry|strawberries]], while four baskets are needed to watch a [[banana tree]].

==Products==
{{Uses material list|Cooking apple}}
==Obtaining apples==
===Respawns===
*3 barrels - on the [[Lady Zay]], while at the [[Pirates' Cove]] (1 barrel is in the hull).
*5 barrels - on the pirates' ship at [[Lunar Isle]]. 1 barrel is on the deck, 4 are in the hull. 2 of the barrels in the hull are inaccessible.

==Item sources==
{{Drop sources|Cooking apple}}

===Spawns===

|3141,3447,qty:1,respawn:40}}
{{ItemSpawnTableBottom}}

===Shop locations===
{{Store locations list|Cooking apple}}

==Trivia==
*The apple's examine of "Keeps the doctor away" is the latter half of the proverb, "An apple a day keeps the doctor away." A barrel of apples (non-carryable) completes the proverb with its examine of "An apple a day..."
*There are a lot of apple trees around the [[The Golden Field]] tavern in [[Hosidius]], however the player cannot pick any apples from these.
*The apples' bright green colour suggests that they are based on Granny Smith apples [https://i.imgur.com/9awO6LC.jpg 1]. In real life, Granny Smiths are used in many cooking recipes, and they are also used to brew alcoholic apple cider [https://www.cookingchanneltv.com/devour/news/2014/11/make-hard-apple-cider-from-store-bought-apple-cider 2].
